pr_title: Avro: Schema conversions should preserve field docs

timeline.message: Handle field level doc comments when converting between avro and iceberg types
Add in test to ensure field docs are preserved in roundtrip iceberg-avro schema conversions

timeline.bodyText:
Technically this limit needs to be at least 12817 bytes.
That's one byte larger than the number of bins used in the tests * the size of the largest manifest file in either test run (v1 or v2, v2 is slightly larger) for the set of operations defined in the test to meet their assertions, but I chose a value slightly larger / rounded value to match somewhat how the test was previously set up.
Feel free to suggest a different value.
timeline.author: kbendick

replies.bodyText: 3x the smaller size would be around 17k, and we need it to be at least about 13k, which is 2x the larger size. I'd probably set this to 15k to split the difference and hopefully avoid needing to update this again as tests change. This is minor, though.
replies.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: I'll open a patch to up this to 15k 👍
replies.author: kbendick

replies.bodyText: Opened a PR for the suggested 15k value: #1999
replies.author: kbendick
